hymn.title: I am the living bread

layout.singingstanza: I am the liv -- ing bread, which came down out of heav -- en; If an -- y -- one, if an -- y -- one eats of this bread he shall live for -- ev -- er; And the bread [skip3] Which I will [skip2] Will give is my flesh, giv -- en for [skip3] for the life [skip2] life of the world. I am the liv -- ing bread, which came down out of heav -- en; If an -- y -- one, if an -- y -- one eats of this bread he shall live for -- ev -- er.
layout.singingstanza2: [skip34] and the bread [skip3] which I [skip8] given for [skip4] for the

hymn.notes: Composed during the 2012 European Young People's Conference in Poland.

lyrics.stanza: I am the living bread, which came down out of heaven; If anyone, if anyone eats of this bread he shall live forever;
And the bread (and the bread) Which I will (which I) Will give is my flesh, given for (given for) for the life (for the) life of the world.
I am the living bread, which came down out of heaven; If anyone, if anyone eats of this bread he shall live forever.
